name: Broke Booger
description:
A 2d platformer made in unity where you can create and destroy the world around you with a short story. 

One giant level and I will be building even more to it soon. Arcade-style, get a high score, and spend your coins in the shop for cool hats/masks! (more to come) 

This is my second game so feedback would be great!

My first is Downhill Hurts, check it out.
